attributes.action: York council to be fix all damaged roads in york and surrounding area
attributes.additional_details: Make york council accountable for maintaining york roads
attributes.background: This petition is for the safety issue on york roads damaged speed humps pott holes that are clearly being ignored york council are responsible for the maintenance

rejection.details:
You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
